unit: Unit 4 | Probability, Random Variables, and Probability Distributions
title: Two Way Tables: Shoes!
question_text: Footwear Weekly magazine conducted a poll of college age, high school age, and middle school age young women about their favorite type of footwear. What is the conditional probability that a young woman is in High School given that her favorite type of footwear is Ballet Flats? Ballet Flats High Heels Sandals Sneakers Total Middle School 14 76 55 99 244 High School 37 33 75 40 185 College 142 63 88 26 319 Total 193 172 218 165 748
